home_page.subtitle: As an open cross-chain bridge protocol based on Substrate, Darwinia focuses on the construction of future Internet of Tokens, including decentralized tokens swap, exchange and market
home_page.subscribe_tip: Subscription success! Please check your inbox.
home_page.theme_desc: As an open cross-chain bridge protocol based on Substrate, Darwinia focuses on the construction of future Internet of Tokens, including decentralized tokens swap, exchange and market
home_page.highlight_block_content_2: The Parachain of Polkadot focused on cross-chain token trading
home_page.highlight_block_content_3: The technology that provides support for cross-chain
home_page.economic_block_content_1: The native tokens for Darwinia Network is RING, RING can be used as gas for transactions. Gas include transaction fees, contract execution fees, network bandwidth charges, storage fees, and more.
home_page.economic_block_content_2: To encourage users to make long term commitments and pledge, users can choose to lock RING for 3 - 36 months in the process of Staking, and the system will offer a KTON token as reward for users participating in Staking.
home_page.economic_block_content_3: The Darwinia Network will distribute RING as an incentive to the participants of Staking. The process of Staking can also be understood as the POS mining process, where the miner obtains Staking energy by pledging tokens for POS mining.
home_page.application_block_content_1: Token DEX is a decentralized application based on the Darwinia cross-chain bridge as the core technology, which can realize automatic cross-chain transactions between tokens
home_page.application_block_content_2: The decentralized nft auction market, which supports nft auctions of different blockchain networks through cross-chain auctions, creates a new NFT cross-chain circulation scenario
home_page.dev_content: Do you want to get involved?
home_page.news_title_1: Darwinia sharing on Polkadot China row
home_page.news_title_2: How to buy/sell RING on uniswap?
home_page.news_title_3: Darwinia Network released its first test network, codenamed "Trilobita"
home_page.watch_token: Add {{token}} to the Metamask token list

faq_page.title: FAQs
faq_page.faq_1_title: What is the relationship between Darwinia Network and Polkadot?
faq_page.faq_1_content: Darwinia Network is the first game chain on Polkadot. The development of Darwinia network is based on Polkadot and Substrate framework. Later Darwin network will become a parachain of the Polkadot network.
faq_page.faq_2_title: What happens if Darwinia Network is no longer a parachain?
faq_page.faq_2_content: Even if Darwinia Network is voted off the Polkadot parachain set, it will still work as a "Solo Chain", where it's responsible for its own security.
faq_page.faq_3_content:
RING is system token of Darwinia Network, the initial supply before Darwinia network mainnet release is 2 billion.
KTON is the staking and governance credential of Darwinia Network, KTON can only obtained by locking RING, the initial supply is 0.
At present, some RING and KTON exist in the Ethereum network and the Tron network in the form of ERC-20 and TRC-20. These TOKENs will be transferred to the Darwinia main network by 1:1 cross-chain conversion after the Darwinia main online.
faq_page.faq_4_title: What is RING and KTON in Evolution Land?
faq_page.faq_4_content: RING and KTON in Evolution Land is the ERC-20/TRC-20 token, Evolution Land will use RING in Darwinia Network as the payment token in game.

brand.title: Darwinia Brand
brand.desc: This page displays the LOGO, icons and other design files of Darwinia Network and Darwinia Crab Network tokens (included: RING, KTON, cRING, cKTON, etc.)
brand.about_desc: Darwinia Network is a decentralized heterogeneous cross-chain bridge protocol developed using Substrate, focusing on decentralized cross-chain token swap, exchange, and market. Darwinia also serves as critical infrastructure for single-chain application upgrades to cross-chain versions, including Defi, Game, DEX, NFT market, etc. Our vision is to build the future Internet of Tokens.
brand.note_1: When using Darwin’s official design documents, please pay attention to the application scenarios:
brand.note_2: 1. Use trendy gradation of the purple logo on white/light background;
brand.note_3: 2. Use the white logo on a dark background;
brand.note_4: 3. Use grey or other color logos if the standard logo is not adept at single color application scene.
brand.note_5: Thank you for your support to Darwinia Network, we hope for pleasant cooperation between us.

ambassador.title: Join the Darwinia Ambassador Program
ambassador.author: By: Darwinia Ambassador Team
ambassador.about_desc: Darwinia Network is a decentralized heterogeneous cross-chain bridge protocol developed using Substrate, focusing on decentralized cross-chain token swap, exchange, and market.  Darwinia also serves as critical infrastructure for single-chain application upgrades to cross-chain versions, including Defi, Game, NFT market, etc. Our vision is to build the future Internet of Tokens.
ambassador.why_desc_1: The mission of Darwinia Network Ambassador Program is to enable those who are passionate about blockchain technology, familiar with Darwinia Network, and active in Web3 Community to collaborate with Darwinia to grow the global community.
ambassador.why_desc_2: We hope to hear about more from the community in different roles, no matter it's fighting for a bunch of codes, crazy for an innovative idea, or just needs help from us, we will treat it sincerely and gratefully;
ambassador.why_desc_3: Don’t hesitate to join us and help to make our voice heard across the various communities.
ambassador.who_desc_1: Anyone can participate in the Ambassador Program;
ambassador.who_desc_2: Anyone can choose to do what they like and make a contribution to the community;
ambassador.who_desc_3: Anyone who contributes will accept the reward and the applause from the Darwinia community!
ambassador.who_desc_4: We encourage any creative behavior and encourage everyone to achieve their growth in the process of creation.
ambassador.who_desc_5: Join the Darwinia Ambassador Program, and make the cross-chain evolution happen.
ambassador.what_desc_1: To make it easier for everyone to participate in the Ambassador Program, we have developed two growth paths for you to choose.
ambassador.tech_desc_1: Two programs have been set up in the technology pathway:
ambassador.link: Please check out the detail here
ambassador.grant_desc: Darwinia Grant will focus on funding the development of the Darwinia ecosystem, such as the development of the Darwinia Network, the development and maintenance of the Darwinia Appchain, and related theoretical research.
ambassador.bounty_desc: We will rate the issues in Darwinia and invite community developers to help with the fix. Community developers can get rewards after fixing the problem and being reviewed. The rewards for fixing different levels of issue will be different.
ambassador.tech_desc_2: Please join the devs group for more latest details: http://t.me/DarwiniaDev
ambassador.edu_desc_1: There are five roles in the community education pathway:
ambassador.content_desc: Educate the community and the broader public about Darwinia through writing informative and insightful content in videos, blogs, graphic designs, podcasts, or any other artistic production form.
ambassador.meetup_desc: Host online or offline Darwinia meetups/ technical workshops/hackathon, connect with local blockchain enthusiasts to educate them on what Darwina is and discover the potential users/partners through discussion and communication.
ambassador.translator_desc: Translate and share Darwinia-related content in different languages and expand Darwinia's ecological application to non-English speaking communities.
ambassador.moderator_desc: Keep Darwinia official social media channels (i.e., telegram, twitter, medium,etc.) informative, productive, and create a pleasant, sustained, and viable environment for community members in multiple languages across various platforms.
ambassador.experience_desc_1: Experience Darwinia Ecological Applications and submit detailed reports according to our requirements. Up to now, Darwinia tech team has created various products on the way leading to Web3.0. For instance:
ambassador.experience_desc_2: Evolution Land: A cross-chain blockchain game to showcase blockchain capabilities and onboard new users.
ambassador.experience_desc_3: Subscan: A high precision data explorer and visualization for substrate-based blockchains.
ambassador.how_title: How to become a Darwinia Ambassador?
ambassador.how_desc: To become a Darwinia Ambassador and kickstart a decentralized revolution, Please apply for an application here. The whole process should be displayed as below:
ambassador.benefit_content: Make our voices heard! We can provide you with the following benefits:
ambassador.benefit_desc_1: 1. Earn a bunch of Ring token rewards.
ambassador.benefit_desc_2: 2. Receive direct ongoing training and support from Darwinia technical team.
ambassador.benefit_desc_3: 3. Connect with other ambassadors over social media to help spread the world about Darwinia.
ambassador.benefit_desc_4: 4. Attend major crypto industry events and conferences with the team.
ambassador.benefit_desc_5: 5. Accept the reward and the applause from the Darwinia community!
ambassador.benefit_desc_6: 6. Swag: T-shirt, Certification, NFT, Stickers, KUDOs.
ambassador.more_subtitle: Darwinia Network is the first game chain of the Polkadot.
